title: First Friday: Welcome Back Bash
description: Kick off the semester with free food, games, and live music! Meet new people and get hyped for the year. The vibes will be immaculate fr fr

title: Lions Basketball vs USC
description: Cheer on the Lions at our rivalry game! Free t-shirts for students and the student section goes crazy fr. Gersten will be LIT

title: Study Abroad Information Session
description: Learn about LMU's study abroad programs in over 40 countries. Pizza will be provided! Perfect for those who want to explore the world

title: Career Fair - Tech & Engineering
description: Meet with top tech companies and engineering firms. Bring your resume! This is your chance to network and land that internship

title: Mental Health Awareness Workshop
description: Join CPS for a workshop on stress management and wellness strategies. Take care of yourself, you deserve it!

title: Taco Tuesday at the Lair
description: Special taco bar with build-your-own options. $2 tacos all day! The lair food is lowkey fire sometimes

title: Midnight Breakfast
description: Free breakfast during finals week! Because studying is hard enough without being hangry. The library grind is real

title: Greek Life Rush Week
description: Explore Greek life at LMU! Meet different fraternities and sororities. The social scene is wild and you'll make friends for life

title: Campus Safety Walk
description: Join Campus Safety for a guided tour of campus safety resources. Stay safe on the bluff!

title: Library Study Session
description: Group study session in the library. Perfect for finals prep or just getting ahead. The library is lowkey packed during finals week

title: Burns Backcourt Study Break
description: Take a break from studying and enjoy the beautiful weather at Burns Backcourt. Perfect for outdoor studying and people watching

title: C-Store Late Night Run
description: Late night snack run to the C-Store. Perfect for those midnight cravings when you're grinding in the library

title: Sunken Gardens Photo Session
description: Professional photos in Sunken Gardens. Perfect for LinkedIn, graduation announcements, or just flexing on Instagram

title: Transportation Tips Workshop
description: Learn about getting around LA and campus transportation options. From Uber to Metro, we've got you covered

title: Housing Fair
description: Explore on-campus and off-campus housing options for next year. The Village is where it's at for upperclassmen

title: Tech Support Drop-in
description: Get help with your laptop, phone, or any tech issues. The IT team is literally the best and super helpful

title: Dining Hall Review Session
description: Share your thoughts on dining options and help improve the food quality. Your feedback matters!

title: Volunteer Day at Local Food Bank
description: Give back to the community with a day of service. Perfect for building your resume and helping others

title: Academic Excellence Celebration
description: Celebrate students with 3.5+ GPA. Recognition ceremony with refreshments and networking opportunities

title: Spirit Week Kickoff
description: Start Spirit Week with a bang! Games, competitions, and school spirit activities. Show your LMU pride
